prefix: Approach the following question the way someone in high school would.
problem_prompt: Approach the following question the way someone in high school would. What is $35_8-74_8?$ Express your answer in base 8.
gpt_response:
To subtract $74_8$ from $35_8$, we first line up the numbers and start subtracting from the rightmost digit:

$ \begin{array}{c@{}c@{}c@{}c} & & 3 & 5_8 \\ &-& 7 & 4_8 \\ \cline{2-4} & & 0 & 3_8 \\ \end{array} $

Therefore, $35_8 - 74_8 = 03_8$
solution_prompt:

Therefore, $35_8 - 74_8 = 03_8$
